testgroup.title: Immobilizer indicator lamp ON check

test1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to ON position using ignition key.

testgroup.question: Does immobilizer indicator lamp (1) come on?

action.ptxt: Check if DTC P1636 and/or P1638 are detected by ECM referring to Diagnostic Trouble Code (DTC) Check:For Petrol Engine Model . If detected, perform the troubleshooting referring to the corresponding flowchart in this section. If not detected, go to Immobilizer Indicator Lamp Does Not Come ON with Ignition Switch ON and Engine Stop:For Petrol Engine Model .

testgroup.title: Immobilizer indicator lamp flash check
testgroup.question: Does immobilizer indicator lamp flash on and off continuously in Step 1?

action.ptxt: Check what DTC is detected by ECM referring to Diagnostic Trouble Code (DTC) Check:For Petrol Engine Model . Then, perform the troubleshooting referring to the corresponding flowchart in this section.
Perform Engine and Emission Control System Check:For Petrol Engine Model .

testgroup.title: Immobilizer indicator lamp remain ON check

test1.ptxt: Check if immobilizer indicator lamp remains ON after engine start.

testgroup.question: Does immobilizer indicator lamp remain ON after engine start?

action.ptxt: Go to Immobilizer Indicator Lamp Remains ON after Engine Start:For Petrol Engine Model .
Immobilizer control system is in good condition. Then, go to Keyless Start System Check for the vehicle with keyless start system.
